about_the_game:
Artwork

  • 18 images of the girls in the game with high resolution.
  • 6 images of the girls not used in the game with high resolution.
  • They are all great backgrounds!

Musics

In .wav format with high quality.
  • Modern Mild - 0:43
  • Modern Koto - 02:51
  • Modern Sakura - 1:00
  • Modern Trail - 0:29

You can find the content inside the installation folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC shows explicit images including nudity.
